title: Which is the most extra K-pop group ever? - Quora

response.answer_text: I’m not sure if the group I’m about to mention are the most extra ever but here’s my preference: BTOB  I mean, have you ever seen any group posing like this on red carpets? Only BTOB knows how to be this extra. And look at the visual of the group. Sungjae is one of the weirdest (in a good way ofcourse) and the most hilarious kpop idols I know! And not just Sungjae. All of them know how to be extra! For instance:   LMAO I just can’t with these boys- Here’s a bonus incase you want to laugh a little more:)  BTOB are amazing vocalists, visuals and pretty talented. Also they are the actual representation of a walking meme! HONOURABLE MENTIONS: BTS GOT7 SUPER JUNIOR SHINee Girls’ Generation (and more…) Have a good day:) EDIT: This is an answer to who is the most extra kpop group ever. Quora merged the original question with ‘Who is the most famous kpop group?’

SHINee-The ‘e' in SHINee represents extra Each n every member in there as their own twist of extraness Almost all kpop groups are pretty hilarious n are a bit extra to an extent but a few have a bit more to it n some of them are Super junior SNSD (Don't put SM groups together they cause ultimate chaos) BTOB F(X) VIXX EXO BTS GOT7…….
